column1: Lead-based paint. Landlords who own homes built before 1978 must provide information about lead-paint concentrations.
Authorized agents. Landlords must also provide all the names and addresses of those involved in owning and managing the property.
Tenant Handbook. Landlords must inform tenants that the stateâ€™s tenant handbook is available at all times.
Orders. Tenants must receive all outstanding inspection and condemnation orders.
